document.full_text: a gulf mediator tried to breathe new life into a deal to resolve a transition of power crisis in yemen on sunday, even as the opposition said it would reject any plan that would extend president ali abdullah saleh's rule.
document.title: yemen deal must not extend saleh rule: opposition
lines_and_colors: a gulf mediator tried to breathe new life into a deal to resolve a transition of power crisis in yemen on sunday, even as the opposition said it would reject any plan that would extend president ali abdullah saleh's rule.
